## TextFieldSet.fieldValues() method

Retrieve the current values of all text fields.

**Signature:**

```typescript
fieldValues(): {
        [key: string]: string;
    };
```
**Returns:**

{ \[key: string\]: string; }

Mapping of field keys to string values.
